report.title: Plant Portal My Visits
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for users to view their own data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations plot ON plot.id = csf.location_id AND plot.deleted=false JOIN locations square ON square.id = plot.parent_id AND square.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND csf.created_by_id=#current_user# AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND csf.website_id in (#website_ids#) #order_by#

param.name: group_id
param.description: Optionally limit samples to particular group.

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
